Title: Semper I
Plot: The political powers that be make big plans for national hero Brody, but his increasingly erratic behavior threatens his media darling status; Carrie grows desperate for evidence linking Brody with Abu Nazir, as Saul directs her to focus on Nazir's money trail.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: David Marciano, Maury Sterling, Navid Negahban, Scott Bryce, Omid Abtahi, Marin Ireland, Hrach Titizian
